name: R4B-Schedule-R5-Schedule
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Schedule into FHIR R5

element.display: A container for slots of time that may be available for booking appointments

target.display: A container for slots of time that may be available for booking appointments
target.comment: R4B `Schedule` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Schedule`

element.display: Whether this schedule is in active use

target.display: Whether this schedule is in active use
target.comment: R4B `Schedule.active` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Schedule.active`

element.display: Resource(s) that availability information is being provided for

target.display: Resource(s) that availability information is being provided for
target.comment: R4B `Schedule.actor` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Schedule.actor` - actor has change due to type change: R4B `actor` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `actor`
R4B `Schedule.comment` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `Schedule.comment` - comment has change due to type change: R4B comment string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 comment
R4B `Schedule.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Schedule.contained`
R4B `Schedule.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Schedule.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Schedule.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Schedule.id`
R4B `Schedule.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Schedule.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `Schedule.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Schedule.implicitRules`
R4B `Schedule.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Schedule.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `Schedule.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Schedule.meta`

R4B `Schedule.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Schedule.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Period of time covered by schedule

target.display: Period of time covered by schedule
target.comment: R4B `Schedule.planningHorizon` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Schedule.planningHorizon`
R4B `Schedule.serviceCategory` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Schedule.serviceCategory`

R4B `Schedule.serviceType` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `Schedule.serviceType` - serviceType has change due to type change: R4B serviceType CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 serviceType
R4B `Schedule.specialty` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Schedule.specialty`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `Schedule.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Schedule.text`
